mission.description: Satellite & mission number (Sentinel-2A, Sentinel-2B, or Sentinel-2C)

details.MSIL2A: MultiSpectral Instrument, Level-2A (Bottom-Of-Atmosphere reflectance, atmospherically corrected)

sensing_datetime.description: UTC date and time when acquisition started in format YYYYMMDDThhmmss

relative_orbit.description: Relative orbit number (R001–R143, repeats every 10 days for Sentinel-2)

tile_id.description: MGRS tile ID (e.g., T32TMT) covering 100×100 km area
tile_id.notes: Zone = 2 digits, Latitude band = 1 letter (C–X, excluding I and O), Grid square = 2 uppercase letters

generation_datetime.description: UTC date and time when the product was generated in format YYYYMMDDThhmmss
